New Records: England secured their first win under manager Lee Carsley with a 3-1 victory over Finland
Key Match Events: England won the match with a final score of 3-1
Goals were scored by Jack Grealish, Trent Alexander-Arnold, and Declan Rice for England; Arttu Hoskonen scored for Finland
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Lee Carsley opted for a new formation with Harry Kane's return
Post-Match Reflections: Lee Carsley was considered for a full-time role after the win
The win moved England closer to securing their next target
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was England's response after a previous defeat against Greece
Noni Madueke and Levi Colwill were notable substitutes
